product_name: Mountain House Macaroni and Cheese - 2 Servings
long_description: You can depend on this all-time favorite to satisfy everybody--as a side dish, or a main meal. Stand-up pouch creates an easy way to cook and eat your meal; made from high-barrier foil, the pouch keeps your meal hot. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided--let stand, and serve. This entree's simple carbohydrates give you immediate energy, while the protein and complex carbohydrates offer sustained energy. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: You can depend on this all-time favorite to satisfy everybody--as a side dish, or a main meal.
